changes: -Added clarification to reaction restrictions for awarding edbucks in the help UI.
-Added clarification to Pick Up Edbucks button in the help UI.
-Bugfix: Fixed bug causing Pick Up Edbucks button to heavily weigh towards the lower reward range.
-Bugfix: Changed Bot Notification Channel Id from existing in config to existing in database file.
-Increased the reward range for the Pick Up Edbucks button from 1-3 to 1-5.
-Added changelog button to view changelog for versions.
-Added status effects section to Show Stats UI.
